ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I think of gambling as a challenge.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: My knowledge and skill in gambling contribute to the likelihood that I will make money.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: My choices or actions affect the game on which I am betting.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: If I am gambling and losing, I should continue because I do not want to miss a win.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I should keep track of previous winning bets so that I can figure out how I should bet in the future.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: When I am gambling, ''near misses'' or times when I almost win remind me that if I keep playing I will win.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Gambling is more than just luck.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: My gambling wins are evidence that I have skill and knowledge related to gambling.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I have a ''lucky'' technique that I use when I gamble.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: In the long run, I will win more money than I will lose gambling.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Even though I may be losing with my gambling strategy or plan, I must maintain that strategy or plan because I know it will eventually come through for me.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: There are certain things I do when I am betting (for example, tapping a certain number of times, holding a lucky coin in my hand, crossing my fingers, etc.) which increase the chances that I will win.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: If I lose money gambling, I should try to win it back.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Those who do not gamble much do not understand that gambling success requires dedication and a willingness to invest some money.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Where I get money to gamble does not matter because I will win and pay it back.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I am pretty accurate at predicting when a ''win'' will occur.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Gambling is the best way for me to experience excitement.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: If I continue to gamble, it will eventually pay off, and I will make money.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I have more skills and knowledge related to gambling than most people who gamble.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: When I lose at gambling, my losses are not as bad if I do not tell my loved ones.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I should keep the same bet even when it has not come up lately because it is bound to win.
Notes: 1=Strongly Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Somewhat Agree; 4=Neither Agree nor Disagree; 5=Somewhat Disagree; 6=Disagree; 7=Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Gamblers Beliefs Questionnaire - Total Score (Reverse-Scored)
Notes: Sum of gbq_1 through gbq_21 items reverse-scored. Higher scores indicate a greater presence of gambling-related cognitive distortions.
